title: Bunk O' Bed
content: A Java application that aims to recreate features based on a popular company, Airbnb

title: AUMUN 2021 Website
content: Developed fully functional responsive website Anna University's second Model United Nations that acted as a gateway and portal for information

title: Classification and Ablation Study on CIFAR-10 Dataset
content: Machine Learning project with GUI with an interactive UI that classifies CIFAR-10 dataset with 88% accuracy

title: Feature Extraction from Comments and Data Analysis
content: Combines concepts of lexical analysis, database management and machine learning to extract features from comments on social media posts and then analyze the data

title: Bizarre Fights
content: A player versus player and player versus computer game built upon semi realistic physics uisng PyGame

title: Jump Street
content: Python based infinite platformer game with semi realistic physics featuring a file system for account management and score storage
